title: Edelweiss General Insurance partners Ashv Finance for MSME loan protection plans - Mint
content: Edelweiss General Insurance partners Ashv Finance for MSME loan protection plans  Mint
description: While Ashv is offering timely credit to fund the growth aspirations of small businesses and MSMEs, EGI will ensure that there are no brakes in achieving their dreams by offering health insurance cover to safeguard the financial interest of this very important segment.
